body:
Comment 3 by **tylor@torbit.com**: 
Could this be the same issue as 5091 ("runtime: unlikely looking panic in append")?
https://golang.org/issue/5091

I've been getting weird SIGSEGVs in inconsistent places that I have been unsuccessful in
reproducing on demand. Here is a recent example:
https://groups.google.com/forum/?fromgroups=#!topic/golang-nuts/uMUmCjMCBkU
